title: [Bug][BuildCheck]: Build succeedes with MSBUILDNOINPROCNODE enabled
body:
### Issue Description

While building with buildcheck enabled and MSBUILDNOINPROCNODE=1 
Severity of the rule set  to Error, does not reported to the all build: 
![image](https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/assets/104755925/679050b5-f697-4999-9af0-242d473cdaf6)


### Steps to Reproduce

Set the default Severity SharedOutputPathAnalyzer to error. 
Repro projects could be found here: https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/blob/d542f3a80101883083b95fff0b67666b63002751/src/BuildCheck.UnitTests/EndToEndTests.cs#L36

### Expected Behavior

Build to fail if the severity set to Error

### Actual Behavior

Errors are logged, 
But the build is green.
